MindSpace::MNode

MindSpace::MNode Class Reference

A MNode represents a single node in MindSpace. Nodes are joined together by MLink objects. More...

Detailed Description

A MNode represents a single node in MindSpace. Nodes are joined together by MLink objects.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MindSpace::MNode::MNode (  ) 

Create an empty MNode with type set to MindSpace::ConceptNode and LTI/STI to 1.0 each

MindSpace::MNode::MNode ( const QString &  content = "",
MindSpace::MNodeType  type = MNodeType::ConceptNode() 
)

Creates a new MNode with the given content and type (defaults to MindSpace::ConceptNode)
